description: Secure access method to be applied to the IPv4 or network address of the client specified by the Client IP Address parameter.             Depending on whether the Web Interface site is configured to use an HTTP or HTTPS virtual server or to use access gateway, you can send clients or access gateway the IP address, or the alternate address, of a XenApp or XenDesktop server. Or, you can send the IP address translated from a mapping entry, which defines mapping of an internal address and port to an external address and port.
Possible values = Direct, Alternate, Translated, GatewayDirect, GatewayAlternate, GatewayTranslated
IPv4 or network address of the client for which you want to associate an access method.
Subnet mask associated with the IPv4 or network address specified by the Client IP Address parameter.
Path to the Web Interface site.
